Class FacultyDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zhukova.uni.db.AbstractDAO<Faculty>
      • by.zhukova.uni.db.FacultyDAO

  • public class FacultyDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Faculty>
    Class FacultyDAO (data access object) is designed to work with database table faculties and Faculty objects.
